relevant_findings.general: Delightful elderly female, alert, interactive, hard of hearing, comfortable, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.heent: PERRL, anicteric, conjunctiva pink, oropharynx without lesion or exudate, moist mucus membranes.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Irregularly irregular without murmurs, rubs, or gallops, JVP is 10 cm H20.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally without rhonchi, wheezes, or crackles.
relevant_findings.gi: Soft, nontender, without rebounding or guarding, non-distended with normal active bowel sounds, no hepatomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Trace pitting edema bilaterally, no clubbing or cyanosis.
relevant_findings.neuro: Alert and oriented, moving all extremities spontaneously, face symmetric.
